name: error-wrapper
description: A base class for errors that wrap other errors.
author: Stephen Sorensen <shuoink@gmail.com> (http://www.stephenjohnsorensen.com/)

scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc --require babel-register mocha -u exports
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ErrorWrapper.js --standalone ErrorWrapper > umd.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
